page.title: 20CHILDRENS CLUBS IN STAFFORD
page.content: BOYS BRIGADE:We have games and do class work.Our uniform is darkish blue with a badge stuck on it. GIRLS BRIGADE:We pay 20p for subs(and if you have a sister there,15p).We learn about Jesus. CUB SCOUTS:We go in a pack circle.Then we play games.Then we go into our work corners. SEA CUBS:We get in our pack and do the Grand Howl. BROWNIE GUIDES:We wear a brown dress,a brown hat,a brown belt and a brown purse.In the purse we have 15p for subs. CRUSADERS:If we go for 10 Sundays we get a badge.If we go for 50 weeks we get a Bible. -------------------- Work on G.E.C.,Riverside,and Clubs compiled by St.Paul's First School. Other items by Leasowes Junior School.
